definition: get over an illness or shock
details:
verb
- get over an illness or shock
= synonyms: recuperate
- regain a former condition after a financial loss
= example: regain a former condition after a financial loss
= synonyms: recuperate
- cover anew
= example: cover anew
- reuse (materials from waste products)
= synonyms: reclaim
- get or find back
= example: get or find back
= synonyms: find
- regain or make up for
= synonyms: recuperate
